turkish_example_sentence: Siz bu önemli toplantıda büyük bir sorumluluk hissedecektiniz.
english_example_sentence: You (plural/formal) were going to feel a great responsibility in this important meeting.
russian_example_sentence: Вы собирались почувствовать большую ответственность на этом важном собрании.
